headline: In a Strategic Bind, Israel Weighs Freeing Hostages Against Destroying Hamas
summary: Some Israeli commanders said the two goals were incompatible. Eradicating Hamas would mean a lengthy war that would most likely cost the hostages’ lives.

headline: LIVE
summary: The chief of intelligence in Syria for Iran’s Revolutionary Guards force was among the dead, according to a semiofficial news agency and an Israeli official.

headline: For the Anti-Trump Wing of the G.O.P., It All Comes Down to Tuesday
summary: The old guard of the Republican Party has rallied around Nikki Haley ahead of New Hampshire’s primary, in a long-shot bid to stop Donald Trump.

headline: The U.S. Seems to Be Dodging a Recession. What Could Still Go Wrong?
summary: Economists have become increasingly optimistic about the odds of a soft landing. But as 2024 begins to unfold, risks remain.

headline: The Market Has Had a Fabulous Run, but This Peak Doesn’t Really Matter
summary: Compound returns that grow as stocks rise over the decades are far more important than the latest high, our columnist says.
